---
title: "Get latitude/longitude for CoCos"
output: html_notebook
---

I need the latitude/longitude so I can get the GBIF data.

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(phyloseq)
```

```{r}
a <- readRDS('./data/phyloseq_objects/CoCosV10I_16S_phyloseq_nt_5bp.rds')
sample_data(a) |> as_tibble() |>  dplyr::select(X_latitude_d,X_longitude_d) |> filter(!is.na(X_latitude_d)) |> 
  unique() |> 
  arrange(X_longitude_d) |> slice(c(1, n()))
```


```{r}
sample_data(a) |> as_tibble() |> View()
```
